body.name: Steam Cleaner, Multipurpose Powerful Steamer with 21 Accessories, Portable Handheld Steam Mop with 38OZ Tank, Natural Cleaning for Home Use, Floor, Grout, Tile, Couch, Carpet, Car
features: ✨ CHEMICAL-FREE STEAM CLEANING: Experience the power of our steam cleaner that offers deep cleaning without the use of harsh chemicals. With the ability to produce high-temperature steam up to 248℉, it ensures thorough cleaning and effective disinfection.

✨ LARGE CAPACITY TANK: The smaller the water tank, the more often you’ll have to top it up. The larger the tank, the longer it’ll take to heat up before it’s ready to use, but it will last longer. Our steam cleaner features a generous 38oz water tank that quickly heats up in under 5 minutes. Enjoy up to 45 minutes of continuous sterilizing and descaling with the high-temperature steam it provides.

✨ EASY & SAFE TO USE: Our steam cleaner is designed for convenience and safety. Simply hold the steam gun by hand and push the steam button forward to release steam directly. If you prefer hands-free operation, just turn the steam lock to the right side. For added safety, our steam cleaner comes with a built-in child safety lock to protect children or pets from accidental injury.

✨ SAVE TIME & SPACE: In the long-run, steam cleaners are not only beneficial to your health, but also to your budget, storage space, and peace of mind. Because steam cleaners with 21 accessories work on so many surfaces and items in the home, you can use them to clean just about everything. That quality eliminates the need for specialized products or tools to clean various items.

✨ WIDE APPLICATION: Our steamer can be applied to every scene of your life, including ceramic tile, grout, granite, sealed wood flooring, laminate, appliances, kitchen range hood, windows, mirrors, grills, autos, and more. Providing an eco-friendly and safe cleaning solution for you and your family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Waitbird's Steam Cleaner is Ushering in The Era of Steam Cleaning
Advanced Steam Cleaning Technology for an Impeccable clean

With its advanced rapid heating technology, it reaches a high temperature of 248°F in just 5 minutes. In addition, Our steam cleaner is equipped with a large capacity 38 oz water tank so that you can enjoy up to 45 minutes of continuous steam cleaning.
Application in Various Scenarios Previous page Next page

Simple Operating Methods STEP 1 Add Water (Preferably Distilled) In order to get the idea of steam, please be sure to fill 10~28 oz water. STEP 2 Close The Safety Cap Close the safety cap by rotating it clockwise. STEP 3 Connect The Plug & Press the Switch Press the power button to enter into heating mode.Note: Do not use a wet hand to touch the power. STEP 4 Wait for The Indicator Light To Turn Green Red light refers to the lackage of water.Green light refers to the working status.

The Shoulder Strap Installation Tutorial Tie the ends of the strap to both sides of the handle of the steam cleaner, then adjust the strap to a suitable length and hang it on your shoulder. Anti-slip pads are attached to the straps. The Base Installation Tutorial The steam cleaner is specially equipped with a detachable base with casters for easy movement. Just gently place the steamer into the base. The Accessories Installation Tutorial Simply attach the accessories to the steam cleaner nozzle as shown in the video. The Mop Installation Tutorial Put the mop accessory on the rag;Open the 4 fixed locks of the mop accessory, fold and clip the excess towel;Assemble the 2 extension tubes and attach to the steamer nozzle. Steam Volume Adjustment Tutorial Our steam cleaner can adjust the amount of steam. To adjust the amount of steam, you can turn the knob from "MIN" to "MAX". Turn the knob to "MIN" for minimum steam and "MAX" for maximum steam. Steam Lock Use Tutorial Manual Mode Hold on to the steamer by hand and move the steam button ahead, steam will come out directly Automatic Mode If you need automatic steam without hand, just turn the steam lock to the right side when in use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely effective, affordable and VERY VERSATILE STEAMER I love it!
reviews.reviewText: The Waitbird steam cleaner is an amazing multipurpose steamer with so many different uses. I researched different steamers for 2 months and finally went with purchasing this one because of the reviews and affordable price. One of the biggest reasons that I purchased this steamer was for the quality of the product and the adjustable output strength option to enhance the use for what I am cleaning without damaging the surface. I found that many other steamers did not have the same adjustable feature and ease of use; and this is an excellent feature to allow you to clean different surfaces from tile, to furniture to car upholstery.I have used the Waitbird to deep clean my showers taking away heavy dirt build up and it works amazing. I love that I don’t have to use any chemicals and the results are incredible. I have saved so much money not having to buy expensive cleaners.It’s also very effective when cleaning my car upholstery and carpets after the kids bring in mud or dirt from their sporting activities.The beauty of this tool is that the pressurized steam is ready rather quick; I have read that other steamers could take up to 7-10 minutes. In addition, the provided attachments are a great value add and allow to clean in different use cases.Finally, the product craftsmanship and quality is top tier; once you open the box, you will realize how well the steamer is made with very durable material.Thank you Waitbird for an amazing steamer and I am so very happy with this product. I have told all my family and friends about it and 4 of them have already purchased one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, Easy and Effective
reviews.reviewText: The waitbird steamer is amazing. I ordered it primarily to clean decades old grime from the grout in our tile floor. It performs beautifully! I have also used it to clean appliances and the baked on film that covered the oven door! One tank of water lasts about 45 minutes...about all the cleaning I want to do at one time. But it heats the water quickly and so longer projects are no problem. It is lightweight and maneuverable. It comes with various attachments that make the waitbird effective for all types of cleaning. It is easy to use and light weight. It is one of the best purchases I have made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, Transportable, Awesome little steam cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to use this machine a couple times before I could leave a review and I couldn't be more pleased. I've been looking at ways to reduce chemical cleaners both for the environment and, more importantly, my children sake. I heard about steam cleaners and some of the very, very pricey options were just outside of my reach. This one not only does the job, but I feel like it's a long-term solution that is beneficial in many ways. It heats up quickly. I had no problem understanding the directions on how to assemble and use. I actually got impatient and tried to open the safety valve before the pressure had properly released and it wouldn't let me! I loved that the designers added this safety feature.Finally, I wish I would have taken a Before & After picture of one project. Namely the bathroom sink. I have used all kinds of things to attempt to clean out our sink and nothing seemed to work. 2 minutes with this cleaner and problem solved.Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used a lot of pressurized steam cleaners, and this one does a great job for the price. The steam could be stronger, but for the basics of steam cleaning this does a job well done with little to no elbow grease. Great for those hard to reach areas and if you have boys…around the toilet base this is a MUST! Overall great product, with simple instructions, if you want a budget steam cleaner with the extras: this is the one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Let Me Put You On Something…
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been eyeing a steam cleaner for months now. I specifically was debating on buying the little white box one all over tik tok. I decided to wait until Black Friday to make my final decision and I really wasn’t happy with the discount they were offering for it. I decided I was going to compare to other steamers on Amazon. AND BOY AM I GLAD I DID! This baby was WORTH IT! This WaitBird was nearly half off on Black Friday. It’s already $70 bucks cheaper than the white box brand at regular price. I was initially hesitant of buying the WaitBird because there wasn’t a bunch of video reviews on “clean-tok”. I’m sure there will be now!Let me set the scene for you. We just moved into an older and not remodeled home. We are planning to remodel sometime next year and didn’t want to spend a bunch of money quite yet. The prior owner had been developing dementia and owned some dogs. Well, they didn’t always make it outside to potty. Hence the hard to remove stains… We also have 3 dogs who have tracked in quite a bit of dirt and mud from outside. Our house came with a carpet shampooer and it has not done much to the stains or the dinginess in the carpets.So on to the actual review of the WaitBird! There are many attachments for the steamer. I have currently only used the floor attachment but can’t wait to use it on the old appliances and windows. The floor attachment can be used with any microfiber cloth but does come with 2 in the box. The clips on the floor attachment were fantastic. I was afraid they would fall off but nope! The cloth stayed on the entire time!I did cleaned the 3 of the dirtiest carpeted rooms in our house (~1,000 sq ft) in 6 hours. I did put some hard work into the floors and was not an easy chore. I also cleaned the parquet in the hallway which it did fantastic on. I probably filled up the tank 10-12 times. I had the steam on the highest setting and it ran about 30 to 35 mins each time. It only took 5 mins to warm up each time and I wish it took longer as that’s when I took my “union breaks”.The unit itself is compact and easy to store! It is lightweight and easy to maneuver. I find the look of it to be retro and simply adorable. Yellow is not my favorite color; however, we decided to name ours Sunshine for fun :)Overall, definitely worth the money! I don’t believe it was made to be professional grade but it does the Lord’s work. We plan to use it on the old appliances left with the house, the windows, and I read that it could possibly help with removing the ungodly amount of wallpaper in the house! I also read that steamers are better to use when sterilizing than using chemicals (aka kids school germs). I’ll update as I use on more things.Enjoy the before and after pictures. I didn’t feel the need to label the pictures with before or after since there was such a drastic difference.My best advice is JUST BUY IT!

I purchased this because of the versatility of all the attachments and it was light and portable. I needed a steamer that I could use primarily to steam my bed, chairs and baseboards. I've unfortunately moved into an apartment building with a history of bed bugs and got hit with an infestation just as I moved in. The exterminator told me this steamer was a perfect choice and would help kill bedbug eggs and the bugs itself on direct contact. I've used it not only on furniture but floor boards, quilts, clothing, mirrors, tiles and floor itself. The tank holds a good amount of water so I can get alot done. Changing attachments is really easy. It let's out a lot of steam and is doing a fantastic job keeping my place sanitary and gives me peace of mind. I just keep it and all the attachments in a tote box. I highly recommend this steamer it's been money well spent.
